name: Space Monkeys (itch)
description: The peaceful world of Chimptopia is in grave danger! The evil alien Oceanics are on the attack! Only you can save the day in this lighthearted endless runner in space. Suit up recruit, and brave the onslaught of fishy monsters who seek to destroy all of chimpkind. Collect power-ups, buy upgrades, and activate the Dooms Day Cannon to send those watery aliens back to the dark depths!
